title: foobar on Narro
description: foobar uses Narro to create a podcast of articles transcribed to audio.

items.title: FAQ for Narro
items.author: foobar@gmail.com
items.content: Listen to your reading list anywhere. Narro will take your bookmarked articles and read them back to you as a podcast. ... http://www.narro.co/faq ...
